description: This model will simulate the spread of an epidemic in a city of 1000 people using agent-based modeling. Each person is modeled as an agent who can move, interact, get infected, recover, or die.

behaviors.name: move
behaviors.description: Each person randomly moves within the city.

behaviors.name: interact
behaviors.description: A person interacts with nearby people. If any of them are infected, the person may become infected based on the infection probability.

interactions.name: Interaction
interactions.description: A person can interact with other persons, potentially spreading or contracting the epidemic.
interactions.effect: If one person is infected and the other is not, the non-infected person may become infected based on the infection probability.

files.name: simulation.py
files.description: Contains the simulation environment and logic
